concept.title: Group Objects
concept.shortdesc: A group is a saved set of objects which you can choose and modify together or separately as needed. Groups provide an easy way to edit the drawing units as a unit. You can add or remove objects to or from the groups as needed.

conbody.p: The objects within a group can be edited as a unit, which resembles blocks. However, the groups are saved from session to session. And you can easily edit individual objects in groups, but in blocks, you have to explode blocks before you edit them. Groups cannot be shared with other drawings.
